front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure: Additional SHAKE Algorithms and Identifiers for RSA and ECDSA

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using the SHAKE family of hash functions in the Internet X.509 as one-way hash functions with the RSA and ECDSA signature algorithms; the conventions for the associated subject public keys are also described. Digital signatures are used to sign messages, certificates and CRLs (Certificate Revocation Lists).
